post:
Back in action one week today at Anfield for the visit of Mikel Artetas Arsenal side. 

4th v 5th in the league, which seemed rather unlikely a few weeks ago. 

Harvey Elliott, Naby Keita, Roberto Firmino and James Milner are the only definite absentees at this moment. Question marks over Joe Gomez and Curtis Jones. 

Game is live on Sky Sports.

Alisson

Trent 
Matip
Van Dijk
Tsimikas 

Henderson
Fabinho
Thiago

Salah
Mane
Jota

So Hendo now has an injury. Jones, Milner, Keita all in doubt. Looks like Fab, Thiago and Ox for Arsenal.

At this moment the only players unavailable for certain  are Bobby and Elliot. Everyone else have a possibility to be available for selection unless otherwise notified.

Glass is half full, unlike others.
AnyWinWhereWeScoreThreeGoalsAndConcedeNoneWillDo.
